Source code for plantit.collection.admin

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import Collection, Sample


[docs]class SampleInline(admin.StackedInline):
    model = Sample
    extra = 0



[docs]class CollectionAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    model = Collection
    inlines = [
        SampleInline
    ]


admin.site.register(Collection,CollectionAdmin)
